subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: England, the first cricketing nation, ended its long wait for a world championship in the sport when it took the World Twenty20 title in Bridgetown, Barbados, beating Australia in the final.
snippet: England, the first cricketing nation, ended its long wait for a world championship in the sport when it took the World Twenty20 title in Bridgetown, Barbados, beating Australia in the final.
